# UITableViewRowAction.Style.default

**Case**

Apply the default style to the button.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Styles

- **destructive**: Equal to the default style.
- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.normal**: Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.

items.description: Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.
items.name: UITableViewRowAction.Style.normal
